heading: Wednesday Night
text: Partly cloudy, except mostly cloudy northeast, in the northern Greens, and northern Champlain Valley. Lows from the mid 30s to lower 40s, with upper 20s to mid 30s northeast and in the Adirondacks, and some mid 20s possible in the cold hollows. North winds 5 to 10 mph, gusting to 20 mph.

heading: Thursday
text: Partly to mostly sunny, except mostly cloudy from the northern Greens eastward. Highs in the low to mid 50s for southeastern valleys, and in the broad valleys west; mid 40s to around 50 elsewhere. North winds 10 to 15 mph, and gusting to 30 mph.

heading: Thursday Night
text: Mostly clear, except becoming so northeast. Lows from the mid 20s to lower 30s, with some mid 30 near Lake Champlain, and lower 20s in northern cold hollows. North winds 5 to 15 mph, gusting to 25 mph early.
